name: The myterious fortune teller
mes: Gira is a wandering hero in a new town who has just taken out a group of bandits. He goes around the city, looking for the guild. He had heard rumors about bad things happening in the town and didn't wish to stay around, unless there was an opportunity to make money that is. It had been a time for Gira and many things were on his mind. Saving princesses, defeating the demon queen, getting enough money... at least he could work things out one step at a time.

name: The myterious fortune teller
mes:
The darkly dressed fortune teller in the black shaman outfit, her face obscured by a mask adorned with a purple spiral, called out to Gira. Her accent had a distinct Slavic lilt that added an air of mystery to her words. "Greetings, brave wanderer," she said, her voice low and smooth. "I see you've had quite the adventures. How may I assist you on your journey?"

Her hands gestured towards a mesmerizing crystal ball that emitted a soft purple glow. The spiral pattern within seemed to draw his gaze despite himself, dulling his mind bit by bit.

Under the table, hidden from Gira's view, her slick, lubricated stockinged feet flexed and twitched with anticipation. She knew exactly what she wanted from him, and she recognized a susceptible mind when she saw one. "Allow me to reveal the secrets that lie hidden in your path forward," she continued, motioning for him to lean closer.

Her staff with a skull perched upon it rested against the tattered blue cloth-draped table, adding to the ominous atmosphere. Wooden signs inscribed with unreadable symbols and an array of strange shamanic items crowded the surface of the table, mingling with flickering candles that cast eerie shadows across the space.

"You look troubled, weary even. Heed my words, and I will show you the way. Tell me, what is it that you seek?" Her fingers moved hypnotically over the crystal ball, urging Gira to focus and speak his desires aloud. The scene was set, her intentions clear as she prepared to ensnare him in her deceptive web.
